metadata.Title: CVE-2018-10927 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium.
metadata.Description: A flaw was found in RPC request using gfs3_lookup_req in glusterfs server. An authenticated attacker could use this flaw to leak information and execute remote denial of service by crashing gluster brick process. It was discovered that GlusterFS incorrectly handled RPC requests. An attacker could possibly use this issue to write iles to an arbitrary location and execute arbitrary code.

criterions.comment: glusterfs: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
